description:
Made with durable Cordura® ripstop nylon, this jacket is perfect for colder adventures. With a PFC-free water repellent finish and 80g of recycled polyester insulation, it provides both protection and warmth. Equipped with a hood, YKK® zipper, and adjustable hem, it ensures a comfortable fit. Complete with zippered pockets and certifications, it's the ideal companion for the great outdoors.

Lightweight and highly packable, this jacket effortlessly fits into your backpack, always ready for your next adventure. Its exceptional versatility and insulation make it a go-to choice for unpredictable weather conditions. Upgrade your outdoor gear with our Lightweight Insulated Jacket and embrace the freedom of year-round exploration.
name: Hooke Lightweight Insulated Hood Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Made of lightweight and durable 1.8 oz CORDURA® ripstop nylon
